Promotions

Promotions on PFUDOR.tk are based on our trust in what is promoted. We'll never endorse anything we don't support 100 percent.

We may appeal you to donate for charities. If so, please note that we do not care about which organization you support. Feel free to donate to a charity of your choice. Our recommendation is nothing more than a recommendation. − However, please help as good as you can. Thank you.

Also, please note that we're not affiliated with any charity we promote.

Report abuse Close

The biggest part of PFUDOR.tk wasn't made by its creators. We're using videos from Andrew Huang, FluffyMixer, and - hypthetically - everyone who uploads videos to YouTube.

If you are a content creator, you can message us, so we can help you on preventing your video from being shown on PFUDOR.tk. Please note that we cannot take videos down from other people's copies of PFUDOR.tk's source code, nor will respond or even care about requests to take down videos from anyone but the original artist.

You can contact us via Skype (bigbuhmann) or Email (drweissbrot@outlook.com).
